title: Pagglait
short_cast: Sanya Malhotra, Sayani Gupta, Ashutosh Rana, Raghuvir Yadav, Shruti Sharma, Sheeba Chaddha, Natasha Rastogi, Rajesh Tailang, Meghna Malik, Jameel Khan, Chetan Sharma, Ananya Khare, Bhupesh Pandya

desc: Widowed soon after marriage, a young woman grapples with an inability to grieve, quirky relatives and a startling discovery about her late husband.
